title: Meetings
description: Manage your meetings with automatic transcription

create.title: Create a new meeting
create.noProjectsAvailable: No projects available. Create projects first.
create.selectAtLeastOneProject: Please select at least one project
create.selectAtLeastOneParticipant: Please select at least one participant
create.transcriptionPending: Transcription will be available in a few minutes

live.title: Record live
live.description: Start a live recording with temporal marking of discussed projects and tasks.

archive.title: Archive this meeting?
archive.description: The meeting will be archived and permanently deleted in 30 days. You can recover it before that date.
archive.successDescription: The meeting will be permanently deleted in 30 days

restore.title: Restore this meeting?
restore.description: The meeting will be restored to active meetings.
restore.successDescription: The meeting has been restored successfully
